definition: to stick sth up (on the wall)/to post (on a noticeboard or website)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: Posts on the resulting civil marriage is also Posted son, named Xi paste.
sentences.chinese: 貼子就由此而來，民間結婚也發貼子，名叫喜貼。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, I'd like to post a quick defense of Kwame.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，我想發貼爲布朗同學好好辯護一下。

sentences.english: Post your goal on your blog and post regular updates.
sentences.chinese: 將你的目標放在博客上，並且定期發貼更新。
